EXTRACTED VALUE: For all its promise, this is another entirely superfluous superhero game. [June 2008, p.70]
Not the worst FPS on 360, but it's a clear second place. Nowhere near good enough. [Apr 2008, p.68]
Magic may be coursing through Eragon's veins but it's exactly what's lacking from this dreary hack'n'slash affair.
This shooter is a painful exercise in pattern memorization plus frustrating trial-and-error gameplay.
A lackluster first person shooter, the game is not only let down by the disappointingly forgettable story, but the horrendous gameplay.
